channel.title: php-fpm on 蜗牛
channel.description: Recent content in php-fpm on 蜗牛

item.title: Linux下设置php-fpm开机自动启动
item.description: 1、创建php-fpm文件 vim /etc/init.d/php-fpm 然后加入下面的脚本： #!/bin/bash # # Startup script for the PHP-FPM server. # # chkconfig: 345 85 15 # description: PHP is an HTML-embedded scripting language # processname: php-fpm # config: /usr/local/php/etc/php.ini # Source function library. #用which php-f
